LanguageData.EF_CottonBoll.label: Cotton boll
LanguageData.EF_CottonBoll.description: Fine threads able to be combined to form larger pieces of cloth when woven together.
LanguageData.EF_DevilstrandThread.label: Devilstrand thread
LanguageData.EF_DevilstrandThread.description: Fine fibres from the Devilstrand fungi, used in creating strong fabrics.
